name: Leeds public bookcases
desc:
Little libraries on OpenStreetMap.

You can help improve this map by adding public bookcases to OpenStreetMap. You need an account (it is free) and then the data will be open for everyone to use.

If you add a public bookcase to OpenStreetMap, be sure to tag it as amenity=public_bookcase and we'll get your update within a day or so. There are other tags you can add such as capacity=30 and operator="Little Free Library".
